data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Canara Robeco Asset Management Company Limited has informed BSE that pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 read with Companys Code of Conduct for prevention of Insider Trading the Trading Window for trading in Equity Shares of the Company will be closed from Thursday January 1 2026 to Thursday January 22 2026 )Both days inclusive) for the Designated /Connected persons and their immediate relatives.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Under Regulations 29 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Canara Robeco Asset Management Company Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 20/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Canara Robeco Asset Management Company Ltd has informed BSE the meeting of the Board of Directors of Canara Robeco Asset Management Company Limited (Company) will be held in Mumbai on Tuesday January 20 2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ending December 31 2025.

data.caption: Reply To BSE On Volume Movement Letter.
data.news_body: Company Reply on the information sought under Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 on Volume movement Letter.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Canara Robeco Asset Management Company Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Canara Robeco Asset Management Company Ltd on December 19 2025 with reference to Movement in Volume.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Record Date For The Purpose Of Interim Dividend.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. on Tuesday December 16 2025 fixed December 22 2025 as the Record Date for the purpose of interim dividend.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: we wish to inform you that the Board has at its meeting held today approved the Interim Dividend of Rs. 1.50 per Equity share and the Record Date for the purpose of Interim Dividend is December 22 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
In accordance with the provisions of Regulation 30 and all other applicable provisions of the Securities 
and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (the 
Listing Regulations) we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors (the Board) of the 
Company at its meeting held today i.e. on Tuesday December 16 2025 inter alia approved the 
payment of interim dividend of ? 1.50 per equity share of (i.e. 15% of the face value of ? 10/- per 
equity share) of the Company to the shareholders of the Company whose names shall appear in the 
Companys Register of Members as at the close of business hours on the record date i.e. December 
22 2025 as well as to those beneficial holders who are registered in the records of Depositories as at 
the close of business hours on the record date.

data.news_body: pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) regulations 2015 read with Companys code of conduct for prevention of Insider trading the trading window for trading in the equity shares of the Company will be closed from December 11 2025 to December 18 2025 (both days inclusive) for the Designated/Connected persons and their immediate relatives.

data.caption: Intimation Pursuant To Regulations 8 (1) And 8 (2) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Prohibition Of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 8 (2) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 ("SEBI PIT Regulations") please find enclosed herewith the code of practices and procedures for fair disclosures of unpublished price sensitive information framed under Regulation 8 (1) of the SEBI PIT Regulations.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Canara Robeco Asset Management Company Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 16 2025 the Equity Shares of Canara Robeco Asset Management Company Ltd (Scrip Code: 544580) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251015- dated October 15 2025.
